tgt_original: 遍行最勝義，　　及與勝流義，

src_original: (Mvbh 35)  niṣparigrahatārthe ca santānābheda eva ca // II.14  niḥsaṃkleśaviśuddhyarthe 'nānātvārtha eva ca /
tgt_original: 如是無攝義，　　相續無別義， 無雜染淨義，　　種種無別義，
不增不減義，　　四自在依義。

src_original: dharmadhātāv avidyeyaṃ akliṣṭā daśadhāvṛtiḥ /  daśabhūmivipakṣeṇa pratipakṣās tu bhūmayaḥ // II.16  dharmadhātau daśavidhe sarvatragādyarthe yad akliṣṭam ajñānaṃ tad daśasu bodhisatvabhūmiṣv āvaraṇaṃ yathākramaṃ tadvipakṣatvāt / yad uta
tgt_original: 法界中有十，　　不染污無明，
